show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.

header.title: The High-Stakes Energy Situation in the U.S.

title: The High-Stakes Energy Situation in the U.S.
content: A conversation with Richard Heinberg, author of The Party’s Over, Peak Everything, and The End of Growth, as well as… being co-editor of the photo book Energy and author of influential reports from the PostCarbon Institute; the falling Return on Investment re drilling now; the shift to renewables and to using less energy [postcarbon.org]; poem by William Blake
